feed.title: Bitcoin Conference: Call For Papers open

entry.title: Bitcoin Conference: Call For Papers open
entry.summary: The call for papers for the Bitcoin2012 conference has been opened and the organizers are inviting proposals. The delay in opening the call for papers has been apologized for. Interested speakers can email their proposals to genjix at bitcoin2012.com. Meanwhile, a list of speakers for the conference is available on the event's website.
